Header_Body: Everything you need to kickstart AngularJS projects with Material Design: a best-practice directory structure, an intelligent build system, and the best web design libraries around.
Item_Body_1: Kickstarts your project quickly, with everything you need, so you can focus on what matters: your app.
Item_Body_2: A smart, Grunt-based build system designed to save you time and energy.
Item_Body_3: Supports a structure that maintains separation of concerns while ensuring maximum code reuse.
Item_Body_4: JavaScript framework that augments browser-based, single-page applications with MVC functionality.
Item_Body_5: The dynamic stylesheet language that extends CSS with efficiency.
